articles.title: Mosquito net with new insecticide reduces malaria cases in Africa: study - North Shore News
articles.description: MONTREAL — A mosquito net coated with a new insecticide that makes the insects unable to move or fly has reduced cases of malaria in children by about 40 per cent, according to a new study conducted in Tanzania involving Canadian researchers.
